action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X ▢ X X
X ▢ ▢ X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ X X
X X ▢ X X

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 grid with "X"s and "▢"s. The top row has two "X"s, a "▢", then two more "X"s. The second row has an "X", a "▢", another "▢", then two "X"s. The third row is all "▢"s. The fourth row is the same as the second row. The fifth row is the same as the first row.

The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:

▢ X ▢ ▢ ▢

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 grid with X's on the top and bottom rows and a diagonal line of X's from the top left to the bottom right. The rest of the grid is filled with empty squares.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 grid with "X"s and "▢"s. The top row has two "X"s, a "▢", then two more "X"s. The second row has an "X", a "▢", another "▢", then two "X"s. The third row is all "▢"s. The fourth row is the same as the second row. The fifth row is the same as the first row.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any "X"s in the third row of your grid?
